text: William Lewis Salyers (born August 16, 1964) is an American actor and voice actor. He is known as the voice of Rigby on Regular Show and the voice of Reverend Putty and Mr. Little on Moral Orel. Salyers was born on August 16, 1964 in Bartlesville, Oklahoma. He was raised in Santa Fe, New Mexico. Salyers studied at the College of Santa Fe.Arnold, John (September 24, 2004). "Learning from a master", Albuquerque Journal, p. title: William Salyers
